This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r} 
#Importing Data Set
ss14pusa = read.csv(file.choose(),header=TRUE)  # read csv file
ss14pusb = read.csv(file.choose(),header=TRUE)

```

```{r}
attach(ss14pusa)
names(ss14pusa)
ss14pusa_edit = data.frame(SEX,FSEXP,OCCP,FOCCP,WKHP,FWKHP,MAR,FMARP,WAGP,FWAGP,SCHL,FSCHLP,ESP,FOD1P,SCHL)
detach(ss14pusa)

attach(ss14pusb)
ss14pusb_edit = data.frame(SEX,FSEXP,OCCP,FOCCP,WKHP,FWKHP,MAR,FMARP,WAGP,FWAGP,SCHL,FSCHLP,ESP,FOD1P,SCHL)
detach(ss14pusb)

Data = rbind(ss14pusa_edit,ss14pusb_edit)
Data

write.csv(Data, file = "Data.csv",row.names=TRUE)
```
